item.title: Hate for Hate
item.description: Hate for Hate is a 1967 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Domenico Paolella.

item.title: One Dollar Too Many
item.description: One Dollar Too Many is a 1968 Spaghetti Western feature film directed by Enzo G. Castellari and starring Antonio Sabàto, John Saxon, and Frank Wolff.

item.title: Shoot Twice
item.description: Shoot Twice is a 1969 Italian Western film directed by Nando Cicero and starring Klaus Kinski and Antonio Sabàto. The film is also known as Twice a Judas.

item.title: Beyond the Law
item.description: Beyond the Law is a 1968 Spaghetti Western film directed by Giorgio Stegani and starring Lee Van Cleef as Cudlip, Antonio Sabàto Sr. as Ben Novack and Gordon Mitchell as Burton. It was first distributed in the United States in 1971.
